cmd.start.greeting: Hello! I'm {botName}, your personal AI assistant.
cmd.start.featureMemory: Chat naturally — I remember important things automatically
cmd.start.sendMessage: Just send me any message to start!
cmd.help.title: Available commands:
cmd.help.footer: Just send any text message to chat with me!
cmd.goals.empty: No active goals. Tell me about your goals in chat and I'll track them!
cmd.goals.title: Active goals:
cmd.memory.empty: No saved memories yet. Chat with me and I'll remember important things!
cmd.vault.indexed:
Vault indexed: {count} document chunks.
Usage: /vault <search query>
cmd.vault.title: Vault results for "{query}":
cmd.note.usage:
Usage: /note <text>
Creates a note in Temp Notes/
cmd.backup.unsupported: Backup not supported for this database type.
media.unsupported: Sorry, I can't process this file type. Supported: images, PDF, DOCX, TXT, MD
media.pdfError: Failed to read this PDF file.
media.docxError: Failed to read this DOCX file.
error.general: An error occurred while processing your message.
error.auth: Cause: Authentication issue. Run `claude login` on the server.
error.authExpired: Cause: Authentication token expired. Run `bun run docker` on the host machine to refresh credentials.
error.rateLimit: Cause: Rate limit reached. Please wait a few minutes.
error.timeout: Cause: Request timed out. Try a shorter message.
rateLimit.exceeded: Rate limit reached ({max} messages/hour). Wait ~{minutes} min.
prompt.vault.instruction: Use these fragments to answer. Reference as: "In the note [[title]]..."
cmd.quiet.enabled: Quiet mode enabled for {hours} hours. No proactive messages during this time.
cmd.help.voice: Send voice messages — I understand speech
cmd.start.featureVoice: Send voice messages — I understand speech
cmd.status.title: Bot Status
voice.error: Failed to process voice message. Please try sending text instead.
prompt.checkIn.label: Recent Check-ins
cmd.projects.empty: No projects yet. Ask me to build something!
code.unavailable: Code execution not available. Enable in config.yaml.
code.startupFailed: Code Agent failed to start: {error} Make sure Docker is running, then: {restartCmd} If that doesn't help, rebuild: {rebuildCmd}
code.containerDown: Code Agent containers are down: {details} Make sure Docker is running, then: {restartCmd} If that doesn't help, rebuild: {rebuildCmd}
code.containerRecovered: Code Agent containers recovered and running normally.
cmd.start.featureCode: Build projects and run code in isolated sandbox
